name: ReSpawn (EpicGamer2469)
description:
Beepbloopis is a small robot child who needs to navigate out of the wacky and zany dungeon of doom! Luckily, every time Mr. Bleepbloopis decies to "power off", he can return and use his discarded former self to navigate the puzzles.

Controls

  • A/D or Left/Right - Walk
  • W or UP - Jump
  • R - Restart

Attribution:

  • Music by Abstraction  http://www.abstractionmusic.com/

This game was made in about less than 2 days due to time constraints with school, so it's not as polished as I would like it to be and I am aware of a few collision bugs present, but I hope it's enjoyable nonetheless!
